Params: {3: 'The tearful red cube disappears in the distance.'}
{3: 'Liv watches it go away, looking worried.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Night Keeper', 3: "Nian won't attack it, so don't worry.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Night Keeper', 3: "Besides, we were also holding back. It didn't suffer real damage.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Night Keeper', 3: "There's no much time left. Let's go back first.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'More red packets are tossed into the bonfire and turned into colorful bubbles that float in the air, lighting up the surrounding darkness temporarily.'}
{2: 'Night Keeper', 3: 'This should buy us enough vision.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Night Keeper', 3: 'These bubbles can only give us light for the night. Even the bonfire may go out sometimes.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Night Keeper', 3: 'We must eliminate Nian once and for all to take our day back.', 4: '1'}
